comments.comment: Nilame= nila mehekaru. Udarata rajasinghe raju kalaye thama nila mehekaruwan hedinwu namaki. Anuradhapura polonnaru yugawala nilame waru natha. Amathi waru EMA sewawan kara atha.mechchara amaruwen adhum adhagena, Aththama kiwwoth me adhuma adhagena rajakari kare kohomadha. E gana dhenaganna puluwan anthima raja kale gena hariyatama danna kenekuta. Rajathuma thamange sewakayanta dhunnu salakum thamai. Nilameh waru thamunta dhun salakuma gana Maya ujaruwen kathakaladha eya rajathuma Gath patta athal ekak bawa mathaka thaba gatha yuthuya
